import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import data from '../../LocalJSON/Users.json' import '../../CSS/Message.css' const Message = () => { const { id } = useParams() const detailData = data && data.find(something => something.id == id) console.log(detailData.name) const [info1, setInfo1] = useState(""); const [fDta, setfDta] = useState(); useEffect(() => { setfDta(data) }, []) return (

<

{detailData.name}
setInfo1(e.target.value)} />
{data && data.filter(FooterData => FooterData.name.includes(info1.srh)).map((el) => { return (

{el.name}

{el.message[0].msg}

) })}
) } export default Message
